about_the_game:
Introducing the Pyro Class



Unleash devastating fire attacks on the insectoids as the Pyro class. Choose the flamethrower for close-quarters combat, scorching multiple enemies in its path. For precision strikes, the mining laser offers a concentrated beam of searing heat.

Harness the destructive power of fire with various abilities. Call in a Napalm Strike to rain down streams of flaming liquid, obliterating clusters of bugs. Use the Incendiary Grenade to create fiery infernos upon impact, engulfing nearby bugs and controlling crowds.

Burn through hordes of bugs and create barriers of fire they dare not cross as the Pyro class.
